headline: S&P 500 Suffers Weekly Drop as Israel, Iran Launch Attacks
summary: The Standard & Poor's 500 index fell 0.4% this week as tensions between Israel and Iran reached a bo

headline: Why Halliburton and Other Oil Stocks Rallied Today
summary: Israel conducted a major strike on Iran's nuclear and military capabilities this morning.  Iran is a major oil and natural gas producer.  The threat to that supply sent oil prices higher, bolstering the growth case for Halliburton.

raw.headline: Why Halliburton and Other Oil Stocks Rallied Today
raw.summary: Israel conducted a major strike on Iran's nuclear and military capabilities this morning.  Iran is a major oil and natural gas producer.  The threat to that supply sent oil prices higher, bolstering the growth case for Halliburton.

headline: Chevron and Halliburton Unveil Next-Gen Hydraulic Fracturing
summary: CVX partners with HAL to launch an autonomous fracturing system that boosts efficiency, control and shale recovery in Colorado.

headline: Chevron and Halliburton deploy intelligent hydraulic fracturing in Colorado, US
summary: The collaboration integrates Chevron's hydraulic fracturing with Halliburton's ZEUS IQ platform.
